## Zulip

The ANU-AAGI team communicate via Zulip (an open-source chat tool). If you are part of ANU and would like to join this Zulip channel, please contact the ANU-AAGI lead. We are interested in consolidating analytical expertise to solve agricultural problems across ANU.

<https://anu-aagi.zulipchat.com/>


## Location

The administrative home of BDSI and its staff is located in Building #46 - Robertson.
